datmanager

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • datmanager.Core

  • public class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    Core class. Contains the method main, the main data loaded by the program and some useful methods
    Author:
    MarcoForlini

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.Boolean AOC
      If true, the editor is in AOC mode
      static boolean LINK_SYSTEM
      If false, disable the link system
      static float VERSION
      The editor version/revision

        public static void loadFile(java.awt.Window parent,
                            DatFile datFile,
                            java.util.function.Consumer<DatFile> onLoaded,
                            java.lang.Runnable onFail)
        Load the given file and disable (but not freeze) the calling window until finished.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent window
        datFile - The datFile to load
        onLoaded - The code to run if loading succeed
        onFail - The code to run if loading fail

                             java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.Collection<DatFile>> onLoaded,
                             java.lang.Runnable onFail)
        Load the given list of files and disable (but not freeze) the calling window until finished.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent window
        files - The files to load
        onLoaded - The code to run if loading succeed
        onFail - The code to run if loading fails

      • saveFile

        public static void saveFile(java.awt.Window parent,
                            DatFile datFile)
        Save the given list of EntryGroup to the given file. Disable (but not freeze) the calling window until finished.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent window
        datFile - The datContent to save

      • openFile

        public static FrameEditor openFile(java.awt.Component parent,
                                   DatFile datFile,
                                   boolean newWindow)
        Try to open the given file or show an error message to the calling component. The file must be already loaded.
        Parameters:
        parent - The calling component
        datFile - The datContent to open
        newWindow - If true, force open in a new window
        Returns:
        The editor window associated to the datContent

      • getBounds

        public static java.awt.Rectangle getBounds(java.awt.Component component,
                                           double width,
                                           double height)
        Calculate the bounds of the given component
        Parameters:
        component - The component
        width - The width in pixels. If ≤ 1, it will be read as fraction of the screen size
        height - The height in pixels. If ≤ 1, it will be read as fraction of the screen size
        Returns:
        The bounds for the passed component.

        Convert a throwable's stack trace to String
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Its stack trace
